alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 8:11PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Geauga and east central Cuyahoga Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 811 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Russell, or 12 miles southwest of Chardon, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chardon, Solon, Warrensville Heights, South Russell, Middlefield, Burton, Highland Hills, Chesterland, Mayfield Heights, Aurora, Beachwood, Bedford Heights, Pepper Pike, Parkman, Chagrin Falls, Huntsburg, Orange, Moreland Hills, Claridon and Gates Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
